snippet: Not long after finishing his hockey career in March, Sean Avery began working with David Lipman, a longtime advertising executive and chairman of the Lipman agency.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column notes that retired NHL player Sean Avery is working with Lipman advertising agency.
lead_paragraph: Not long after finishing his hockey career in March, Sean Avery began working with David Lipman, a longtime advertising executive and chairman of the Lipman agency.

headline.seo: Sean Avery Is Not the Average Ad Executive
headline.main: From Madison Square Garden to Madison Avenue
headline.print_headline: From Madison Square Garden to Madison Avenue
